Footer.contactSubtitle: We carefully follow up and implement your technical support requests, questions, and suggestions.

hero.h1: Key to the Digital Future: Weecoins
hero.subtitle: Manage your crypto assets with Weecoins, seize earning opportunities, and claim your place in the digital economy.

videoContainer.subtitle: Watch this video to learn more about WeeCoins and discover the future of the financial world.

card1.title: Strong Connections with SMEs
card1.content: Over 5,600 small and medium-sized enterprises are advancing with us on the path of digital transformation. We offer reliable and scalable solutions.

card2.title: Expanding Customer Ecosystem
card2.content: With more than 12,000 satisfied customers, we continue to provide solutions that simplify business processes and enhance efficiency.

card3.title: Global Service Network
card3.content: We operate actively in 9 countries. With our solutions that transcend digital boundaries, we create impact worldwide.

card4.title: Strategic Business Partnerships
card4.content: Together with 24 strong business partners, we are building an ecosystem that fosters innovation. Together, we achieve more.

ecosystem.subtitle: The WeeCoins ecosystem simplifies your business processes, increases your revenue, and offers unique experiences to your users.

slide1.subtitle: WeeCoins International offers our valued business partners the best opportunities to establish their own social commerce ventures. With its strong and secure infrastructure, WeeCoins provides users with a unique experience while offering reliable and innovative solutions for the future of cryptocurrencies.

slide2.title: What is the WeeGold Network?
slide2.subtitle: The WeeGold network is operated by WeeComi International and has a wide range of uses in the crypto world. It supports the cryptocurrencies WeeCoins Premium (WCP) and WeeCoins (WCS), which were launched in 2020 and are actively traded on various international platforms.

slide3.subtitle: Turn fun into earnings with WeeZard! While enjoying games like jackpot and scratch cards, earn WCP. Use your WCP for various benefits and increase your excitement as you discover more. Try your luck in every game, double the thrill with every win!

slide4.subtitle: Register on Weekobi and earn WCP as you sell – both you and your customers benefit. With a sales-based advertising model, your visibility increases and your earnings grow. Reuse your WCP in the system or convert it. Plus, your business gains priority visibility among WeeKobi users, making it easier for customers to find and shop with confidence.

slide5.subtitle: Digitize all your contact information with WeeCard and share it instantly via QR code! Gather your social media, products, catalogs, and communication channels all in one place through its advanced interface. Everything is professional, fast, and impressive.

weelife.subtitle: We deliver your Qurbani donations to our brothers and sisters in Burkina Faso through WeeCoins, spreading hope and joy together.

card1.title: One Sacrifice, Endless Gratitude!
card1.content: As a responsible organization, we extend our helping hand to the people of Burkina Faso during Eid al-Adha. We share the joy and spirit of the holiday with the local community by delivering your sacrificial donations to those in need. Join us in experiencing the peace that comes from sharing.

card2.title: WeeCoins is There for Them this Eid
card2.content: As the WeeCoins family, we are once again in Burkina Faso this Eid. We offer Qurbani, share with the local people, and gift children an unforgettable holiday. Eid is especially for children; a smile on their face is worth a thousand thanks. Together we bring hope, together we grow stronger.

card3.title: One Donation, One Smile
card3.content: By donating your Qurbani, you can become part of this great change. With your contributions, we share not just meat, but hope and happiness. Every Qurbani means an unforgettable Eid memory in a child’s life. Let’s bring more smiles together.

card4.title: Share Hope, Brighten the Future
card4.content: This Eid, you can make a difference in the lives of our brothers and sisters in Burkina Faso. Your Qurbani donations won’t only fulfill a religious duty but also shine a light of hope on a community’s future. Join us for a more meaningful Eid.

AboutPage.subtitle: Weecoins is a versatile and powerful crypto asset operating on the Weegold network. With a wide range of use cases from shopping to smart contracts, staking to AI-powered applications, it is not just an investment tool but a core component of the digital economy ecosystem.

weegold.title: What is the WeeGold Network?
weegold.content: The WeeGold network is operated by WeeComi International and has a broad range of applications in the crypto world. It supports the cryptocurrencies WeeCoins Premium (WCP) and WeeCoins (WCS), launched in 2020, and is actively traded on various international platforms.

blockchain.title: What is Blockchain?
blockchain.content: Blockchain is a distributed ledger technology that ensures data is stored securely and transparently. Each piece of data is a block in the chain, and these blocks are cryptographically linked.
blockchain.content2: This technology is mainly used for cryptocurrencies but is also applied in finance, supply chains, digital identity, and more. The decentralized structure of blockchain eliminates intermediaries, reduces costs, and accelerates transactions.

weecomi.content: Founded in 2013, WeeComi International is a software company with AI-based cryptocurrency exchange projects. With investors in 10 countries and nearly 40 business partners, it is positioned as a global brand.

weelife.content: WeeLife is a humanitarian project initiated by WeeComi International to improve the quality of life in Africa, particularly in Tanzania.
weelife.content2: The project aims to establish a global chain of aid and promote social responsibility initiatives.

EcosystemPage.subtitle: WeeEcosystem is a WCP-supported holistic digital platform that combines many different solutions—from digital identity to social commerce, fun games to second-hand marketplaces. Digitize your communication with WeeCard, earn while playing with WeeZard, grow your business with WeeKobi, and sell your products with WeeSale. Step into the new world of digital income for both individuals and businesses!

weecard.title: What is WeeCard?
weecard.content: Digitize all your contact information with WeeCard and share instantly via QR code! With its advanced interface, gather your social media, products, catalogs, and communication channels in one place. Everything is professional, fast, and impressive.

weezard.title: What is WeeZard?
weezard.content: Turn fun into profit with WeeZard! While enjoying games like Jackpot and scratch cards, you earn WCP. Use your WCP for various advantages and increase your enjoyment as you discover more. Try your luck in every game, double the excitement with every win!

weekobi.title: What is WeeKobi?
weekobi.content: A social commerce platform that connects SMEs with digital customers, offering global benefits and passive income through a discount card and franchise model. Your advertising budget may be limited, but with the right channels and strategies, you can achieve more visibility at a lower cost. To grow your business, reaching potential customers more effectively is essential.
weekobi.content2: WeeKobi is a digital income network for businesses. When a customer visits a business, they can pay with WCP. This way, the business promotes itself to existing users and earns income. WeePoint helps customers discover nearby businesses. Users can register in the app and invite others using a referral code.

weesale.title: What is WeeSale?
weesale.content: With WeeSale, list your new or second-hand products for sale using WCP easily. You can spend your earned WCP or use them as an investment. Earn passive income through your referrals! Plus, thanks to its user-friendly interface, creating listings and selling takes just minutes.

NewsPage.subtitle: WeeCoins is making headlines in the crypto world with its remarkable achievements. It continues to stay in the spotlight through international awards, expert reviews, and global launches. Thanks to its reliability and innovative approach, it has become a focal point for both investors and the media.

weecoins.title: Weecomi Disrupts the Crypto Sector with Weecoins
weecoins.subtitle: As a sub-brand of Weecomi International, Weecoins launched its own cryptocurrency and exchange, entering the crypto sector.

cryptoCurrencyExpert.title: Özkan Cıbır Named Crypto Expert of the Year
cryptoCurrencyExpert.subtitle: The Golden Angel Awards found their recipients at a glamorous ceremony at Istanbul MKM. From business to society, from sports to the arts, many notable names were honored. One of the evening’s highlights was Özkan Cıbır, a pioneer in the crypto sector, who received the Crypto Expert of the Year award.

shopping.title: A New Era in Shopping with Weecoins
shopping.subtitle: Weecoins will expand the use of cryptocurrencies in daily and local shopping worldwide.

wedding.title: A Thousand Cryptos from the Groom’s Relative
wedding.subtitle: At the wedding of Oğuzhan and Özge Altunkürek in İskenderun, Hatay, a unique gift ceremony was held. A thousand cryptocurrencies, each worth $3, were gifted by family member and crypto investor Hamza Özkan Cıbır. The bride’s father, Metin Buluç, said it was the first time he had seen such a gesture and wished for the digital currency to bring good fortune to everyone.

kripto.title: Özkan Cıbır Named Crypto Expert of the Year
kripto.subtitle: Since 2020, Özkan Cıbır has been working in the crypto field in Turkey and conducting trainings in many countries around the world. The successful entrepreneur, who owns a local blockchain network, also develops AI-based trading bots and offers custom tokens for firms and associations. He also runs TV programs to share crypto knowledge with broader audiences.

expert.title: Awarded Crypto Expert of the Year
expert.subtitle: At a spectacular ceremony held at Istanbul MKM, the Golden Angel Awards were presented. These prestigious awards span from sports to the arts, honoring excellence across various fields. One highlight was Özkan Cıbır receiving the Crypto Expert of the Year award for his impact on the crypto sector.

WeelifePage.h1: Share the Joy of Eid with WeeLife
WeelifePage.content: As WeeCoins, we set out to share the joy of Eid with children in Burkina Faso. With your Qurbani donations, you can bring smiles to more children's faces and help them experience a joyful Eid.
WeelifePage.content2: Let’s grow the happiness of sharing together! With your support, Eid can become more than just a day – it can turn into an unforgettable memory.

right.title: Share Eid Joy, Become a Partner in Hope!
right.content: As a socially responsible organization, we extend a helping hand to the people of Burkina Faso during Eid al-Adha. We share the joy and happiness of the holiday by offering Qurbani and distributing it to the local community. Join us to experience the joy of sharing!
right.content2: WeeCoins is bringing festive joy to children in Burkina Faso! Eid is always more magical in childhood. We gift them clothes and smiles for a holiday they’ll remember forever. We are stronger together—join us to grow hope.
right.content3: Be part of this great change by donating your Qurbani. You can contribute to spreading hope in Burkina Faso. Together we can bring more smiles and light up the future of an entire country!
right.content4: By joining this meaningful project that nurtures hope in Burkina Faso, you contribute to the betterment of the community and make your Eid more meaningful.

modal.nameWallet: You can send your desired donation amount to the wallet address created in your name below.
modal.afterDonation: After your donation, your name will be listed among the supporters.

modal.note: Make sure the amount you send matches exactly. If it does not match, the transaction will not be processed.

ContactPage.subtitle: Contact us, we'd love to meet you.
ContactPage.text: In the infinite universe, every discovery brings a new perspective. Let's push the boundaries together through collaboration and shape the future.

form.title: Let's Strengthen Our Connections
form.subtitle: We would be happy to answer your questions and explore collaboration opportunities.

SuccessStoriesPage.content: Discover inspiring success stories from our real users. Become a part of this great community by sharing your own journey. Each path is shaped by determination, persistence, and seizing opportunities at the right time. You will realize you are not alone on the road to success and find inspiration in shared experiences. Share your story now and light the way for others!

NewsFromUs.title: News From Us
NewsFromUs.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest developments.

weecoins.title: Weecomi Disrupts the Crypto Industry with Weecoins
weecoins.subtitle: Weecomi International has entered the cryptocurrency industry by launching its own cryptocurrency and exchange under its sub-brand Weecoins.
weecoins.description: The mobile crypto payment system Weecoins is being launched as a platform and application that will enable users to send and receive cryptocurrency and earn money while facilitating mobile payments for local shopping, e-commerce, flight tickets, hotel reservations, and daily transactions. Weecomi International's Founder and President Özkan Cıbır has been helping small and medium-sized businesses adapt to technology and transition into mobile commerce since 2013.

weecoinsInfo.title: Mr. Özkan, can you provide information about Weecomi International and Weecoins?
weecoinsInfo.description: Weecoins was established in 2013 as a subsidiary of Weecomi International, operating in Turkey, Azerbaijan, Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, and Georgia. Weecoins was created to provide more attractive payment options to the stores and customers that Weecomi International has built over the years. By establishing its own currency infrastructure, Weecoins encourages customers to use Weecoins for transactions, offering additional discounts and promotions. Our goal is to build the world's largest shopping community and merge physical and online commerce through e-commerce.
weecoinsInfo.slogan: We will break new ground in today's and future economies.

interview.ozkanCibir: Özkan Cıbır: 'Weecoins will be a marketplace. We will digitize businesses through local sales teams, call centers, and local advertisements. The business network will be supported by online and mass marketing. As the Weecomi mobile application, we will act as a payment system partner, and businesses within the payment system pools will have the potential to become Weecomi businesses.'
interview.cibir: Cıbır: 'Until 2009, there were only 8 million millionaires worldwide. After 2014, there was a millionaire boom, and by 2020, this number exceeded 17 million. So, what caused this change? It was cryptocurrencies, which are widely discussed today but known by only 2% of the global population. The daily trading volume of the world's top 10 cryptocurrency exchanges is $56 million. Yes, the world is changing much faster than it did in the 2000s. Those who see the opportunity and adapt to this change achieve their dreams.'

difference.title: What sets you apart from other cryptocurrency companies?
difference.description: Our difference from other cryptocurrency companies is that we have a shopping infrastructure. Most cryptocurrencies are launched first, and then they try to create places where they can be used for transactions. Unfortunately, many fail at this and either disappear or lose value. Weecoins, on the other hand, is a cryptocurrency backed by Weecomi International, which has built tens of thousands of stores and a customer network of hundreds of thousands worldwide over seven years. From the moment Weecoins is launched, it already has ready-to-use stores and customers. Additionally, it is one of the rare cryptocurrencies with its own exchange. Weecomi International's proprietary gaming application, Weemobil, with 170,000 customers, will add further value by allowing payments with Weecoins.

stockMarket.title: Mr. Özkan, can you elaborate on your own exchange?
stockMarket.description: Yes, we have our own exchange called Weeswaps. This exchange hosts not only our cryptocurrencies but also allows users to trade the top 10 cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dash. Weeswaps holds the title of being the first official exchange in Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan and is also legally operating in Turkey.
stockMarket.slogan: The Weecomi Wallet creates an ecosystem.

interview.detailText: Özkan Cıbır: 'Weecoins and the Weecomi Wallet create an ecosystem where shopping, payments, and earning money are possible through a free mobile application. Weecoins, a universal and decentralized cryptocurrency wallet, enables users to shop, purchase deals, buy Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies with a credit card, send, receive, and store cryptocurrencies, and use the points and coins earned from transactions made within the Weecomi app for payments.'

cryptoCurrencyExpert.title: ÖZKAN CIBIR SELECTED AS THE BEST CRYPTOCURRENCY EXPERT OF THE YEAR
cryptoCurrencyExpert.subtitle: The Golden Angel Awards found their owners in a magnificent ceremony held at Istanbul MKM. Many prominent figures from business, society, sports, and arts were honored for their achievements. One of the most notable names of the night was Özkan Cıbır, a pioneer in the cryptocurrency sector, who received the Best Cryptocurrency Expert of the Year award.
cryptoCurrencyExpert.description: Since 2020, Cryptocurrency Expert Özkan Cıbır has been working in the cryptocurrency field and has been selected as the Cryptocurrency Expert of the Year. As one of the leading figures in Turkey, Cıbır organizes training sessions in various countries worldwide. The successful entrepreneur, who owns a local blockchain network, not only provides training but also develops AI-based trading robots. These robots offer special tokens to many firms and associations globally. Additionally, he hosts programs on various TV channels, sharing insights into the world of cryptocurrency with a broader audience.

africa.title: New Project in Africa
africa.description: Özkan Cıbır stated that they are preparing for a new project in Africa in 2024: 'Apart from Turkey, we are running official projects in Azerbaijan, Russia, Kazakhstan, Georgia, and Kyrgyzstan. In 2024, we plan to conduct research and development studies in the African market. We are holding meetings with bureaucrats regarding the legal status of cryptocurrencies. We will lead significant projects and investments in these regions as well.'

risk.title: Ways to Trade with Minimum Risk
risk.description: Speaking at the award ceremony, Cıbır said, 'We believe that cryptocurrency will become highly significant in the future, and we continue our efforts to prepare people for this new world. Under our blockchain, we have developed both a coin and a token. Security and reliability are crucial in this field, so we continuously innovate and develop our work with the support of technology. Our efforts are paying off and leading to success, strengthening our position both in Turkey and globally. With this innovative approach that we embrace at all times, we will continue to change negative perceptions in the sector and show people how to trade in cryptocurrency markets with minimum risk.' Mentioning their Weecoins brand, Özkan Cıbır said, 'Weecoins is the first and only patented cryptocurrency in Turkey, developed by us. We took an innovative step by establishing our blockchain network. Since 2020, we have been operating with official offices in 8 different countries and have investors in nearly 50 countries worldwide. Weecoins stands out with its feature of distributing monthly dividends to investors who hold their assets, making it unique in the cryptocurrency market. This development is seen as a significant milestone in Turkey's cryptocurrency industry.'

shopping.title: A New Era in Shopping with Weecoins
shopping.subtitle: Weecoins will popularize the use of cryptocurrencies in daily and local shopping worldwide.
shopping.description: Özkan Cıbır, Founder of Weecomi International, which operates in countries such as Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, and Turkey, stated that Weecoins is a subsidiary of Weecomi International, founded in 2013. With Weecoins, users will be able to complete their daily shopping such as flight tickets, hotel reservations, and online shopping by using cryptocurrencies on a single platform. Özkan Cıbır mentioned that Weecomi International has created a shopping bridge between customers and stores worldwide, with over 10,000 partner stores and nearly 270,000 customers. Leveraging this vast network, Weecomi aims to increase cryptocurrency usage by making Weecoins available for use by customers in partner stores in 2021. A total of 900,000,000 Weecoins will be produced, with production set to be completed over five years. Weecoins, which has investors in 20 countries, has risen from $0.08 to $0.30 since February, offering a 4x return.

freeMobile.title: Free Mobile App
freeMobile.description: Özkan Cıbır stated that the free mobile application Weecoins Wallet creates an ecosystem where shopping, payments, and earning money are possible. With the Weecoins crypto wallet, users can shop with Weecoins, purchase cryptocurrencies with credit cards, send, receive, and store Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies, use points and coins earned from purchases made through the Weecomi app, and make payments via partnered payment platforms. Weeswaps is defined as Turkey's most innovative digital asset trading platform. Weeswaps users can make transactions at their desired prices without waiting, using fast buy and sell options. All digital assets can be stored in offline wallets with physical security.

wedding.title: A Thousand Cryptos from the Groom's Relative
wedding.subtitle: In Hatay Iskenderun, an interesting gift ceremony was held at the wedding of Oğuzhan and Özge Altunkürek. A family member, Hamza Özkan Cıbır, who is a cryptocurrency investor, gifted the bride and groom with a thousand cryptos, each worth 3 dollars. The bride's father, Metin Buluç, stated that they had never encountered anything like this before and wished everyone good luck with digital currency.
wedding.cibir: Cıbır said, 'Perhaps we have created the event of the future. Everything is becoming digital. Even at weddings, gifts can be given in this way.'

kripto.title: Özkan Cıbır Named Cryptocurrency Expert of the Year
kripto.subtitle: Since 2020, Cıbır has been actively working in the cryptocurrency field in Turkey and conducting training sessions worldwide. The successful entrepreneur, who owns a local blockchain network, not only provides education but also develops AI-based trading robots. These robots offer special tokens for various companies and organizations worldwide. Additionally, he hosts programs on multiple TV channels, spreading knowledge about the cryptocurrency world to a broad audience.

expert.title: Named Cryptocurrency Expert of the Year
expert.subtitle: A grand ceremony at Istanbul MKM honored the winners of the prestigious Golden Angel Awards, recognizing excellence in various fields from sports to arts. One of the evening's highlights was Özkan Cıbır receiving the Cryptocurrency Expert of the Year award, recognizing his contributions as a leading figure in the sector.
